name: Buzzy Plugin: Responsive web layout tests
description:
Buzzy lets you build working apps straight from Figma.


This is an example app showing a bunch of layout tests to see how Figma's layout constraints, sizing and positioning settings translate to a browser via the Buzzy Figma plugin. Now includes the option to turn on wrapping in an auto layout when published - see the video!


Grab this file, install the plugin and hit publish - you'll have a working app in a browser.


New to Buzzy? Try the 'Getting Started' guides
